name: Ham and Hash Brown Quiche
author: Candace Standfield
ingredients: 3 cups frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
¼ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Press hash brown potatoes between paper towels to remove excess moisture
Transfer potatoes to an 8-inch pie dish and press into the bottom and up the sides of the dish to form a crust
Bake in preheated oven until golden, about 25 minutes
Remove from oven and reduce heat to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine ham, Cheddar cheese, onion, and bell pepper in a bowl; spread mixture over potato crust
Beat eggs, milk, salt, and black pepper in the same bowl; pour over ham mixture
Bake in oven until eggs are set, 25 to 30 minutes
